articles.title: 26 Nations Unite to Protect Ukraine After War Ends
articles.summary: French President Macron announced that 26 allied countries have committed to deploying military forces in Ukraine post-conflict. This reassurance force will maintain presence on land, sea, and air to guarantee Ukraine's security against future threats.

articles.title: Goldman Sachs Predicts New 'Postmodern' Stock Market Super Cycle
articles.summary: Goldman Sachs strategists, led by Peter Oppenheimer, identify fourth major bull run since WWII, dubbed 'postmodern cycle'. This structural shift represents significant historical change in stock market dynamics.

articles.title: African Nations Unite to Address Climate-Conflict Connection
articles.summary: African countries are preparing to adopt the Common African Position at the Africa Climate Summit, highlighting the growing recognition of climate change's role in regional conflicts and security challenges.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Global unity takes center stage today.

historicalEvents.description: Great Fire of London begins, destroying much of city
First Continental Congress assembles in Philadelphia
Russia and Japan sign Treaty of Portsmouth, ending war
Munich Olympics massacre: Israeli athletes taken hostage
